trends: There have been no other sightings in Reeds Spring
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: May have been a plane, definitely not satellite
divs: sighting detailsmatt boerema mufon #18871 was out smoking before i was heading to bed. my view from my back deck i can see orion(making sure my north\south are correct for the earlier questions) i had seen an amber light through the trees but thought it was a star. i knew venus had been out and i knew where that was, but since this seemed more amber i thought it was something i hadn't seen through the trees before. i kept an eye on it, it seemed like it was swaying and gaining altitude. i thought i was keeping my stationary view through the trees-and the wind or leaves made it seem like it was just harder to see the light. that's when i finally noticed it was moving! it seemed to ascend after i finally realized it wasn't a star. it moved over my head and have video of it, but i need to buy\find my cable. (stupid) as it passed over there seemed to be no noise, but we do have a highway not too far away. however, it did seem to turn into a plane as it flew overhead because the lights started flashing almost like an airplane and hadn't before. so, i do have my doubts that it wasn't anything more than an airplane. i had looked at flight tracker 20 minutes or so after i got my computer up and running, but i hadn't seen anything near us\let alone from the branson airport(kbbg). so, i will purchase and or find my cable tomorrow and hopefully it showed up on the camera i had. i will send daytime photos of the area as well.
